5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and raw-edge hems.

Lightly padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a zip fly and press-studs and adjustable hook and loop tabs at the waist. Zipped side pockets, a flap back pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and shaping seams at the knees for best fit. Reinforced hems and snow flaps with reinforced elastication at the hems. Lined. Detachable, elasticated braces that cross at the back. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
